title: IT Project Manager of PHP
description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

•	Manage progress and issues of multiple small projects
•	Ensure any outputs of project members
•	Build network and servers required these products above
•	Source code review
•	Educate & support the other members
•	In charge of Scrum master
requirements:
Required

•	Strong entrepreneurship
•	Strong mind to improve software quality
•	Strong mind to keep learning new technology
•	Experience & skill of PHP and its framework
•	Experience & skill of RDBMS such as MySQL
•	Experience to write test code
•	Experience of Agile process such as Scrum
•	Experience of source code review
